wikipedia_page.main: Lord Frederick Montagu (8 November 1774 – 4 October 1827) was a British politician. He was Postmaster General between 1826 and 1827.

link_mentions.page: Postmaster General of the United Kingdom

response: * Lord Frederick Montagu (1774–1827), who died unmarried.

After his return to Britain Manchester served as Postmaster General between 1827 and 1830 (succeeding his younger brother Lord Frederick Montagu).leighrayment.com Peerage: Mance to Massereene He was also Lord Lieutenant of Huntingdonshire between 1793 and 1841.
